name: Aardvark
body:
### Welcome to Aardvark
This site is a placeholder. Who wants to complete it? :-)

Mailing lists:
* Users: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/aardvark-data-users
* Developers: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/aardvark-data-dev
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
